name: California Chicken Caesar Sandwich
description: An easy, portable, and delicious way to use up leftover cooked chicken.

ingredients.name: medium-sized panini buns or chopped baguette

preparation: Using Funnel, measure oil, milk, dressing mix, yogurt, and lemon juice into Cruet. Screw on lid; shake to mix. If making ahead, cover and refrigerate up to five days.
In a bowl, combine 1⁄2 cup dressing and chicken.
Slice avocado. Slice buns open and toast, if desired.
Fill each bun with lettuce, chicken, avocado, and topper. Drizzle with more dressing and top with parmesan cheese, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies, your choice.

products.name: Caesar Dressing Mix
summary: This dressing is a little bit of magic: It’s rich, creamy, full of flavour, and it has zero sodium! Take it far beyond Caesar salad and use it as a sauce for pizza, a dip for veggies, chicken fingers, and zucchini fries, or mix it in your white pasta sauce. Simply mix the blend with mayo or Greek yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, and milk, and it’s ready for anything!

products.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: The days of dry oven-roasted chicken that takes forever to make are over! There’s a better way, and it’s quick, juicy, and oh-so-tasty with Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning. In 20 minutes, you can cook a whole chicken in the microwave using the Round Steamer. With a flavour that outshines the store-bought kind—free of unnecessary additives and too much sodium—Rotisserie Chicken is so fast and easy it’s perfect for any night of the week!

products.name: Better Than Bacon Topper
summary: Ok, bacon lovers; we see you. We know that bacon made from ‘pinto beans’ has you feeling a kind of way: skeptical. But trust us, this fan fave does not disappoint and it’s so easy to use. No need to grab a frying pan — just pop the top and shake on the taste of bacon with way less sodium, zero cholesterol, and no artificial flavors or colors (unlike popular brands). These crunchy bites are layered with smoky bacon flavor and are an amazing addition to salads, potatoes, eggs, and more!

products.name: Funnel
summary: Funnel wet or dry ingredients without spills or clogging.
